channel.title: Item looks like other item
channel.description:
Okey so i've added a custom called 'hell sword' and for some reason every shortbow (shortbow, oak shortow, willow shortbow,...) turns into the hell sword and it looks like dropped on the ground.
Picture to show what i mean : http://prntscr.com/6juyg6

item.title: Item looks like other item
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

You’ve overwritten the shortbow’s wield model with the “hell sword” inv/drop model. It’s like that for all the shortbows because they are all just recolors of the same shortbow.

What you need to do is change the drop/inv model you’re using to another one.

On your hell sword’s ints find this and change it to another, free id.

Or if you’re using a renamed client, find this and do the same.

Read full topic

item.title: Item looks like other item
item.dc:creator: @Project_Runescape Project Runescape
item.description:
@Project_Runescape wrote:

[quote=“iisayboom, post:1, topic:550684”]Okey so i’ve added a custom called ‘hell sword’ and for some reason every shortbow (shortbow, oak shortow, willow shortbow,…) turns into the hell sword and it looks like dropped on the ground.

Picture to show what i mean : http://prntscr.com/6juyg6[/quote]
change modelID //u know itemDef.anInt165 // male wield model itemDef.anInt200 // female wield model
in itemdef or class 8

Read full topic

item.description:
@ProjectDarkSouls wrote:

Correct me if I am wrong, you need to play around with the ints?
